title: The Sylvester Stallone Hall of Fame With Bill Simmons
description:
Sylvester Stallone is back on the big screen in ‘Samaritan,’ an Amazon Prime superhero vehicle with Stallone at the center. To mark the occasion, Sean is joined by Bill Simmons to build out the Sly Hall of Fame.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Bill Simmons
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
